# tf.contrib.memory_stats.BytesLimit

``` python
tf.contrib.memory_stats.BytesLimit()
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/contrib/memory_stats/python/ops/memory_stats_ops.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.13/tensorflow/contrib/memory_stats/python/ops/memory_stats_ops.py).

Generates an op that measures the total memory (in bytes) of a device.
